snippet: The 94-year-old former Turkish president who came to power in a 1980 military coup could face a life sentence for the military takeover, a prosecutor said on Tuesday.
abstract: Kenan Evren, 94-year-old former Turkish president, could face life sentence for his part in the 1980 military coup that led to his taking power.
lead_paragraph: The 94-year-old former Turkish president who came to power in a 1980 military coup could face a life sentence for the military takeover, a prosecutor said on Tuesday.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
